players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I have critical information: Bob is the mafioso. We must vote to arrest him now to protect the town."
Charlie: "Diana, your accusation is serious. Bob, how do you respond to this claim?"
You: "I stand by my denial. I believe Diana has made an accusation without solid evidence."
Charlie: "Diana, can you explain what evidence you have against Bob? We need more than just accusations to vote someone out."
Diana: "I understand your caution, Charlie. My evidence is from last night’s investigation—Bob’s role was confirmed to me privately. If we delay, Bob could kill another innocent player tonight."
